class.name: Trading
class.brief_description: Resource that identifies a creation process happening in [TradeStation].
class.description: Trading process is stored in its own resource and can be serialized ([method serialize]) and deserialized ([method deserialize]) for persistence and networking purposes. It also contains a [method process] that is called to update the time process of a trading.

method.name: deserialize
method.description: Updates the data for this trading process with a [param data] dictionary. Useful for game persistence and network synchronization.

method.name: is_finished
method.description: Returns true if this trading has finished.

method.name: process
method.description: Calls a time process for trading to happen, this should be called by [CraftStation].

method.name: serialize
method.description: Transforms trading process data into a dictionary. Useful for game persistence and network synchronization.
